message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, even exceeding the benefits you might find elsewhere.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position on saving money.  While I can't go as low as $11,500, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $12,750?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. Can you consider $12,200?
